General.Name: Shinva Medical Instrument Co Ltd
General.Description: Shinva Medical Instrument Co., Ltd. provides medical instruments and equipment in the People's Republic of China. It offers CSSD integrated solutions, pharmaceutical equipment integrated solutions, radiotherapy integrated solutions, digital operating room integrated solutions, dental integrated solutions, medical environmental protection integrated solutions, experiment animal safeguard integrated solutions, in vitro diagnostic reagents and instruments, and biomedical materials and supplies. The company also provides laboratory products, such as bio-safety steam sterilizers, VHP disinfectors, mice lVC cage systems, cage washer-disinfectors, animal drinking water disinfectors, and rat insulators; infection control products, including CSSD integrated solution, steam sterilizers, low-temperature sterilizers, washer-disinfectors, drying cabinets, consumables, packing materials and accessories; and radiation and diagnosis equipment, such as medical linear accelerator, cobalt-60 therapy equipment, brachytherapy equipment, big-bore spiral CT, and simulator. In addition, it offers OR products comprising air purifiers, OR tables, OR lights, ceiling supply units; and dental products, including dental unit, autoclave, handpiece washer-disinfector, zirconia ceramic and accessories, as well as pharmaceutical machinery and medical waste treatment services. Shinva Medical Instrument Co., Ltd. was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Zibo, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Cai Xiang  Li
